title: Production Supervisor
description:
Company:
Saipem
Project:
P79
Job Title:
Production Supervisor
Location:
Brazil
Duration:
3 months
Start Date:
1st October 2025
End Date:
30th December 2025
About us:
Saipem is a global leader in engineering services for the design, construction and operation of complex infrastructures and plants in the energy sector, both offshore and onshore.
With our five business lines - Asset Based Services, Energy Carriers, Offshore Wind, Sustainable Infrastructures, Robotics & Industrialized Solutions - we are One Company present in around 60 countries with over 30,000 employees of more than 130 nationalities, providing the world the innovative excellence of our people and our partners.
Mission:

  • Supervise site activities such as commissioning, start up and operation. Ensure compliance of the activities for which he is responsible with the established process and HSE requirements, while respecting the relative time. Supervise all operations activities such as operation procedures preparation, QA / QC certification, Fire Fighting System usage, HSE system usage and Integrated Control System usage in the relevant field of interest. Supervise maintenance and inspection activities and Spare Parts reliability for safe operation in the relevant field of interest.
  • Ensure safe and efficient commissioning, start-up and operations of the process facilities and be proactive in maintaining high Standards, working shifts and on call 24 hours
  • Liaise with Vendors/Subcontractors when on board

Tasks:
During commissioning & start-up Phase:
  • Ensure that all activities within his area of responsibilities are done in full compliance with the HSE requirements
  • Actively contribute to Safety Walkdown. Prepares incident reports and contributes to investigations
  • Approves work permits during his shift as per procedure to enable the execution of scheduled works. Ensure the works are conducted in compliance with approved safety and quality standards
  • Identifies, reports and follow up risks within own area of responsibility
  • Identifies and control hazards to avoid damage to equipment, personnel and the environment
  • Follow up of mechanical completion and Commissioning planning, status and activities
  • Prepares and Issue shift report
  • Supervises the Pre-Commissioning, Commissioning & Start-up activities according to the approved operating procedures
  • Supports Licensor/Vendors at Site in order to meet specified Commissioning & Start-up targets
  • Takes lead in preparing the operators for Commissioning/Start-up and normal operation through extensive training and tasks.
  • Timely report any gaps that need to be bridged
  • Makes decision for stopping equipment based on experience and abnormal situations

During Operations Phase:
  • Direct/work with Control Room (CR) Operator, Production Operators, Laboratory Technician
  • Ensure/promote safety awareness
  • Maintain clear production history of process operations/equipment informing Production Superintendent
  • Report deficiencies/malfunctions to Production Superintendent and propose solutions, if any
  • Ensure all plant is operated safely in accordance with Company/Client procedures
  • Act as Permit to Work Co-ordinator when required
  • Know emergency response actions/duties required in emergency/abnormal situation as per Emergency Response Procedure
  • Prepare plant for intrusive maintenance
  • Prepare process operating procedures/guides
  • Monitor/controls all process equipment via control system in the CCR
  • Know/understand actions required to maximize safety and minimize commercial loss
  • Ensure proper handover during shift change/crew change
  • Have understanding of chemical injection systems with regard to product specification, hydrate/wax formation
  • Do daily management of production plant maintenance, general housekeeping of the Process Deck and preservation of the Process Area by dedicated team
  • Have other responsibilities as delegated by the Superintendent

How to Apply:
If you are ready to take on this challenging role and contribute to the success of Saipem's projects, please submit your CV in English by clicking on the link below.#J-18808-Ljbffr

title: Banco De Talentos - Pessoas Com Deficiência
description:
Banco de Talentos - Pessoas com deficiência

Ser a Melhor Empresa de Saneamento PARA o Brasil.

Nascemos em 2017 com esse compromisso. Desde então, estamos presentes em 39 municípios, com mais de 2,5 mil colaboradores, 6 milhões de clientes e o propósito de atuar da melhor forma para levar saneamento às populações atendidas, ajudando o país a alcançar a universalização dos serviços de água e esgoto.

O saneamento básico no Brasil está no momento de transformação e marcado por novos projetos de expansão. Na Iguá acreditamos que ser diferente é um caminho para ser melhor, essa atitude está no nosso DNA. Valorizamos a diferença em todos os contextos e trabalhamos para promover uma cultura ética e inclusiva, sempre. Como companhia e time, buscamos a equidade e respeitamos todos os tipos de diversidade.

Venha fazer parte dessa mudança, acreditamos na força de cada individualidade para gerar transformação!

Locais de atuação:
São Paulo, Rio de Janeiro, Cuiabá, São José do Rio Preto, Mirassol, Andradina, Palestina, Atibaia, Castilho, Piquete, Paranaguá, Arapiraca, Paty do Alferes, Miguel Pereira, Alta Floresta, Pontes e Lacerda, Colíder, Comodoro.

Requisitos e qualificações:

As vagas podem surgir em todas as áreas da empresa. Se você é uma pessoa com deficiência, inscreva-se no nosso banco de talentos e, assim que surgir uma oportunidade que combine com o seu perfil, entraremos em contato!

Em 2017 nascemos com um desejo:
ser a MELHOR empresa de saneamento PARA o Brasil.

Desde então, somos uma das principais empresas do setor no país, está presente em 8 operações, de cinco estados brasileiros – Alagoas, Mato Grosso, São Paulo, Paraná e Rio de Janeiro beneficiam milhões de pessoas, por intermédio de concessões e de parcerias público-privadas. Em setembro de 2024, vencemos o leilão de concessão parcial dos serviços de abastecimento de água e esgotamento sanitário de Sergipe, onde atenderemos 74 municípios, e o leilão de PPP da Companhia Estadual de Saneamento do Paraná (Sanepar), arrematando o lote 3, pelo qual vamos operar em 28 municípios da região Oeste do Paraná. Atuamos com o forte propósito de proporcionar qualidade de vida e saúde à população atendida por meio de um serviço de qualidade na distribuição de água e de coleta, afastamento e tratamento de esgoto. Em 2024, fomos eleita pelo 8º ano consecutivo uma ótima empresa para se trabalhar pela consultoria Grate Place to Work (GPTW).

Mais do que uma atividade empresarial, encaramos a universalização do saneamento básico como um compromisso de larga escala com a vida, as pessoas, o meio ambiente, os parceiros e o desenvolvimento sustentável do Brasil.

O nosso jeito de ser é marcado pelo DNA inovador que proporciona um ambiente acolhedor, respeitoso e de muitos aprendizados, gerando grande impacto na sociedade. A valorização e o respeito as diferenças estão presentes na empresa para promover uma cultura ética e inclusiva sempre e um ambiente psicologicamente seguro para mulheres, pessoas com deficiência, pessoas negras, pessoas LGBTQIA+, independente de suas crenças, idade ou qualquer outro marcador social ou identitário. Buscamos a equidade e respeito e em nossas equipes então venha fazer parte dessa mudança, acreditamos na força de cada individualidade para gerar transformação! Já somos mais de 2.500 colaboradores e estamos expandindo em um ritmo acelerado e com perspectiva para muito mais!

Você alguma vez já se perguntou sobre seu propósito e qual história quer escrever para a sua vida e carreira? Sempre sonhou em ter papel protagonista na sua carreira e impactar a vida de milhares de pessoas? Você pode fazer parte disso!

#VemSerIguá

Vamos construir um futuro melhor, Iguá Saneamento.

Somos a Eletrobras, empresa líder em geração e transmissão de energia elétrica no Brasil e na América Latina. Por meio de nossos ativos, contribuímos para que a matriz energética brasileira seja uma das mais limpas e renováveis do mundo.   • Captação de recursos;
  • Preparação e gestão de contratos;
  • Inglês Intermediário.

Na Eletrobras, o bem-estar e a qualidade de vida dos nossos profissionais também fazem parte da Nossa Energia. Por isso, estamos empenhados em oferecer um ambiente de trabalho que valorize o equilíbrio entre vida pessoal e profissional, disponibilizando benefícios que promovem o bem-estar, o desenvolvimento e o atendimento às necessidades dos nossos times. Alguns dos benefícios que disponibilizamos estão disponíveis abaixo:

Vale-refeição e vale-alimentação;

- Seguro de Vida;

- Auxílio educacional;

Se esses benefícios e essa posição fazem sentido para você, inscreva-se já!

Cuidamos do planeta entregando a energia em que a gente acredita

Somos a Eletrobras, empresa líder em geração e transmissão de energia elétrica no Brasil e na América Latina. Por meio de nossos ativos, contribuímos para que a matriz energética brasileira seja uma das mais limpas e renováveis do mundo.

Alinhados à nossa Cultura e Propósito, trabalhamos de forma integrada para contribuir com o desenvolvimento sustentável que gere valor para toda a sociedade. Com capacidade instalada de 44.6 GW, estamos presentes em todas as regiões do país e somos referência em uma energia de baixo carbono.

Há mais de seis décadas, nascemos para gerar energia. Uma energia que nos conecta, inova, transforma, integra e contribui com o amanhã. Somos comprometidos com a vida. Oferecemos um ambiente seguro, íntegro, respeitoso e inclusivo, que promove oportunidades contínuas de desenvolvimento aos profissionais em sinergia com o nosso negócio.

title: Consultor De Campo Em Vendas
description:
Descrição da Empresa

Para nós, educação é um ato de liberdade.


Ensinar um idioma é algo que muda a vida das pessoas por criar possibilidade que antes não existiam e oferece a coragem de escolher novos caminhos que antes eram inimagináveis, permitindo que sonhem sonhos nunca antes sonhados.


Essa é a nossa missão no mundo, e essa será a sua missão ao se juntar a nós.


Aqui, aprender vai além do conteúdo acadêmico – nossa metodologia conecta você ao mundo e cria novas oportunidades.


A KNN é a maior rede de ensino de idiomas do Sul do Brasil, e está entre as 5 maiores redes de Ensino de Idiomas do Brasil segundo a Associação Brasileira do Franchising - ABF.


Estes são nossos valores e princípios:

  • Não ser igual a todo mundo;
  • Seguir a nossa matemática do sucesso;
  • Sonhar alto e corremos na frente
  • Empreender e aprendemos
  • Ensinar e transformar pessoas
  • Focar no resultado
  • Saber fazer
  • Respeito & Confiança
  • Comunicar com Clareza e Simplicidades;
  • Ser rápido, massem pressa.


Quer entender mais a fundo esses princípios, e como colocamos isso em prática?


Cadastre-se em nossas vagas em aberto.


Descrição do Cargo

Estamos procurando um Consultor de Campo em Vendas para se juntar à nossa equipe de Implantação de Franquias.


Este cargo é focado em realizar visitas de campo para apoiar e acompanhar a performance de nossas franquias.


Sua vivência será dentro das Escolas KNN, liderando a implantação de novas unidades fraqueadas.


Você desempenha o papel de um Gerente Comercial, e serve como exemplo e inspiração para a Equipe Comercial da nova escola.


Além disso, para a área Comercial, você é o braço direito do Novo Franqueado(a), ajudando essa pessoa a fazer a colocar em prática todos os ensinamentos do Treinamento de Franqueados.


Nunca desempenhou esse papel?


Sem problemas! Na KNN contratamos além da experiência, mas sim por perfil cultural.


Você será treinado durante 6 meses pelos nossos de especialistas do Time de Implantação e do Time de Suporte Comercial.


As responsabilidades diárias de um Consultor de Campo em Vendas incluem:

  • Criar um Plano de Ação para abertura e inauguração da nova Escola;
  • Recrutar e Selecionar uma equipe comercial para a nova Escola;
  • Treinara Equipe Comercial com base nas práticas comerciais de uma Escola KNN, mais especificamente disseminando a Teoria Comercial KNN.
  • Implementar estratégias de vendas , colocando em práticas as Campanhas Comerciais e Ações de Externo .
  • Matricular novos alunos para comprovar a eficácia da Teoria Comercial KNN;
  • Treinaro novo Franqueado com base na Rotina Gerencial Comercial;
  • Acompanhar indicadores de desempenho da unidade e ajustar a rota com base no Plano de Ação criado;


Qualificações

  • Vendas e Estratégias:
     Necessário possuir experiência em vendas e habilidade em desenvolver e implementar estratégias eficazes.
  • Treinamento e Desenvolvimento:
     Habilidade para realizar treinamentos de equipes de vendas, promovendo capacitação e melhor desempenho.
  • Análise de Desempenho:
     Conhecimento em acompanhar e analisar indicadores de desempenho para identificar áreas de melhoria.
  • Franchising :
    Vivência em ambientes comerciais e/ou franquias será um diferencial.


Perfil Desejado:

  • Postura profissional e excelente comunicação interpessoal;
  • Proatividade, autogerenciamento e alto poder de motivação própria e de terceiros;
  • Capacidade de convencer e influenciar pessoas;
  • Comprometimento com resultados e com a qualidade de entrega;
  • Flexibilidade para viagens e atuação em campo;
  • Habilidade paralidar com diferentes perfis e culturas organizacionais;

description:

Analista de Marketing

Local:

Sobre a Cremona Capital:

A Cremona Capital é uma empresa inovadora no segmento de mercado de capitais em geral, reconhecida por impulsionar negócios por meio de soluções estratégicas, investimentos inteligentes e uma abordagem voltada ao crescimento sustentável. Nosso time é composto por profissionais apaixonados por resultados, inovação e excelência.


Descrição da vaga:

Estamos buscando um(a) Analista de Marketing dedicado(a), criativo(a) e analítico(a), para integrar nosso time. O(a) profissional será responsável por planejar, implementar e acompanhar estratégias de marketing que elevem a visibilidade da marca Cremona Capital e suas investidas e potencializem nossos resultados.


Principais responsabilidades:


- Desenvolver e executar planos de marketing digital e tradicional


- Gerenciar produção de conteúdo para redes sociais, website, newsletters e campanhas de e-mail marketing

- Realizar análises de dados de campanhas, identificando oportunidades de otimização

- Apoiar a definição e implementação de estratégias de mídia paga e orgânica

- Elaborar relatórios de desempenho, apresentando insights e recomendações

- Colaborar com equipes internas de vendas, operações e criação para alinhamento de ações

- Monitorar tendências de mercado, concorrência e inovações do setor


Requisitos:

- Formação em Marketing, Comunicação, Publicidade ou áreas relacionadas

- Experiência comprovada na área de marketing, preferencialmente com foco em segmentos similares

- Conhecimento avançado em ferramentas digitais (Google Analytics, Google Ads, Facebook Ads, etc.)

- Excelente habilidade de comunicação e redação

- Perfil analítico, orientado a resultados, com atitude proativa

- Capacidade de trabalhar em equipe e de gerir múltiplas tarefas


AGUENTAR PRESSÃO É UM MUST!


Diferenciais:

Conhecimento em design gráfico ou produção de conteúdo visual

Experiência com automação de marketing e CRM

Inglês ou outros idiomas serão considerados um diferencial


O que oferecemos:

Ambiente de trabalho dinâmico, inovador e colaborativo

Oportunidades de crescimento e desenvolvimento profissional

Benefícios compatíveis com o mercado

Eventual equity pool


Como se candidatar:

Envie seu currículo atualizado para e com o assunto “Vaga Analista de Marketing - Cremona Capital”.


  • Venha fazer parte da nossa equipe e contribuir para transformar ideias em resultados de impacto!

title: Performance Marketing Manager (Full-Time/Remote)
description:
Smile is a national digital health company with almost 20 years in the industry, comprising 5 divisions including the National Dental Network, Health Fund Partnerships, Projects & Investments plus more recently, Retail Dental Cover and Corporate Dental Cover.


Smile is committed to revolutionising quality healthcare accessibility and affordability for the people of Australia. Smile is the top-rated dental cover in the country, offering Retail Dental Cover to the public and Corporate Dental Cover to companies and their teams across Australia.


Smile has been operating successfully with a globally distributed team since 2017.


The Role


ROLE OBJECTIVES


This performance profile seeks to attract a performance marketer with a proven track record of driving business growth using paid tools such as Google Ads, Meta Ads, Bing Ads, TikTok, and other paid marketing platforms.


As a performance marketer, you will be accountable for driving revenue and sales for Retail Dental Cover and Corporate Dental Cover.


This role will be reporting to the Head of Marketing and will be a part of the Retail Dental Cover & Corporate Dental Cover Divisions. The position will have a full-time commitment of 40 hours per week with at least 6 hours of crossover b/w 8 am-5 pm GMT+10 (Brisbane, Australia)


Key Responsibilities


Strategic Campaign Development


  • Develop and execute paid search strategies aligned with business goals to increase member acquisition for our dental cover products across Google, Bing and other relevant search platforms.
  • Develop and execute paid social campaigns to acquire new members and retain existing ones.
  • Develop platform-specific ad creatives (videos and static) along with a detailed plan to drive revenue and sales across Facebook, Instagram, TikTok, YouTube, and other relevant channels.

    • Campaign Optimisation


    • Continuously monitor, analyse, and optimise PPC campaigns to maximise ROI, improve click-through rates, and reduce cost per acquisition across platforms. This includes optimising targeting options, ad placements, and bidding strategies.
    • Collaborate with the sales team to align messaging and drive enterprise-level growth.
    • Conduct thorough keyword research to identify relevant search terms and opportunities. Manage keyword bids, ad copy, and landing page optimisation to enhance campaign performance across all advertising channels.
    • Monitor, develop and analyse paid social campaigns to maximise ROI and reduce cost per acquisition across platforms. This includes optimising the target audience, ad creative and landing pages.

    • Own the Complete Funnel


    • Develop ideas for generating leads and revenue through targeted Top, Middle & Bottom of the funnel campaigns.
    • Maintain a 360° view of the funnel, tracking everything from impressions to conversions on a daily basis.
    • Identify opportunities and troubleshoot issues at both the campaign and website levels to optimise performance.
    • Monitor key metrics and report insights regularly to drive timely improvements.
    • Work closely with stakeholders (design, content, and IT) to address and resolve the funnel-related concerns.

    • Budget Management


    • Effectively manage PPC and paid social budgets to ensure optimal allocation of funds across campaigns and channels, maintaining a balance between cost efficiency and performance.

    • Testing


    • Develop testing hypotheses and implement a prioritised testing plan to ensure continuous learning.
    • Coordinate A/B testing of ad copy, creative and bidding strategies to identify high-performing variations and improve overall campaign and company search performance.

    • Performance Reporting


    • Generate regular reports on key PPC metrics, including impressions, clicks, conversions, and cost per conversion across all advertising platforms. Provide actionable insights and recommendations based on data analysis to drive continuous improvement in campaign performance.
    • Generate regular reports on key paid social campaign metrics. Provide actionable insights and recommendations based on data analysis to drive continuous improvement in campaign performance.

    • Hunt for New Platforms


    • Explore new opportunities across paid platforms and channels to sustain and accelerate growth.
    • Drive revenue with a growth mindset - through structured experimentation programs, learn from failures and make data-driven decisions.

    • Collaboration & Communication


    • Collaborate with the designer & content manager to ensure creatives and communication are in line with brand guidelines.
    • Work closely with the SEO lead and the rest of the Growth Marketing team to align performance marketing strategies with organic search initiatives and overall marketing programs.
    • Communicate campaign performance, updates, and insights effectively to stakeholders.

    • KEY PERFORMANCE INDICATORS


    Acquisition (Grow Smile™dental cover)


    Drive month-on-month growth in dental cover sales by building and executing a scalable acquisition plan for Smile™. Stay forward-looking, adapt confidently in ambiguity, and operate with a strong growth mindset to consistently achieve targets.


    ROI (Return on Investment)


    Measure the sales and revenue generated from individual platforms and campaigns. Track, monitor and improve the Lifetime Value of the customer, ensuring positive ROI for each campaign.


    CAC (Customer Acquisition Cost)


    Monitor and optimise the average cost incurred to acquire a new member or lead through campaigns, maximising new member acquisition within budget parameters.


    Monitor and implement strategies to improve metrics across each stage of the acquisition funnel.


    Ideal Profile


    Requirements


    This FULL-TIME ROLE will only suit someone who also meets the following requirements:


    • Has a passion for excelling in all they do, and this is evidenced in the extra references provided in your application.
    • Has extensive experience and evidence of achieving exceptional results with paid platforms like Google Ads, Meta Ads, and other paid social platforms.
    • Demonstrated success running successful Google ads and Meta ads is a must.
    • Should be analytical, strategic, and creative when the role requires it.
    • A growth mindset is essential - someone who embraces challenge, learns from feedback, and continuously seeks improvement.
    • Has perfectly spoken & written English.
    • Has the highest integrity.

    • If you believe you are a great fit for the role and meet ALL requirements above, we are looking forward to hearing from you!


    What's on Offer?


    • 100% Remote:
      Enjoy the flexibility and convenience of working from anywhere.
    • Full-Time Position:
      Secure a stable and consistent work schedule.
    • Similar Time Zone:
      Work seamlessly with a team in a compatible time zone.
    • Established Company:
      Join a nearly 20-year-old successful & growing organisation.
    • National Presence:
      Be part of a national Australian company.
    • Meaningful Work:
      Contribute to a noble mission to revolutionise quality healthcare accessibility and affordability.
    • Top-Tier Leadership & Team:
      Collaborate with 'A' leadership and 'A' players, including a successful Australian/Canadian Founder & CEO and a successful Silicon Valley CMO and a successful Head of Marketing from India.
    • Excellent Culture:
      Thrive in a positive and supportive work environment with a long-serving team.
    • Integrated Marketing Strategy:
      A company with a cohesive marketing strategy ensures that PPC and paid social campaigns align with broader marketing goals, improving overall campaign effectiveness and brand consistency.

title: Devops Tech Lead
description:
Important Information

Location:
Brazil

Job Mode:
 Full-time

Work Mode:
Work from home

Job Summary

We seek an experienced high-performing DevOps engineer for a position supporting and developing new tools and processes to be used on an on-prem private cloud application. The successful candidate must have experience in on-prem and cloud-native DevOps tools and be a highly adaptable team player who can quickly ramp up on new technologies and accomplish goals in a fast-paced agile environment. Your role will involve to communicate technical concepts clearly, facilitate discussions, collaborate with stakeholders, provide project updates and mentor team members.

Responsibilities and Duties

  • Digest requirement from product and development teams and design high performance DevOps pipelines;
  • Raise and discuss trade-offs of different design approaches elaborating detailed design documents;
  • Maintaining and improving a CI/CD pipeline based on Jenkins;
  • Create and maintain tools to automate the build process of the product;
  • Keep the infrastructure as a code using Terraform;
  • Develop solution components in partnership with the Dev team;
  • Participate intechnical discussions with customer operations and development team;
  • Follow Agile processes and participate actively in all development phases, fostering a culture of collaboration.


Essential Skills

  • Knowledge/Experience in Infrastructure as Code/config management tools such as Terraform/Packer/Ansible;
  • Knowledge/Experience in scripting languages such as Python, Shell script, Bash or Golang;
  • Experience with container technologies such as Docker and Kubernetes;
  • Experience with Helm;
  • Experience with Git;
  • Comfortable with Linux Environment for development.


Highly Desirable Skills

  • Experience with Microservice Architecture;
  • Experience with monitoring and observability platforms;
  • Experience with Gerrit or Github;
  • Comfortable working with and architecting scalable software systems;
  • Know IP networking, web protocols, and REST;
  • Knowledge/experience in Agile development using Scrum or Kanban Methodology.

About Encora


Encora is the preferred digital engineering and modernization partner of some of the world’s leading enterprises and digital native companies. With over 9,000 experts in 47+ offices and innovation labs worldwide, Encora’s technology practices include Product Engineering & Development, Cloud Services, Quality Engineering, DevSecOps, Data & Analytics, Digital Experience, Cybersecurity, and AI & LLM Engineering.


At Encora, we hire professionals based solely on their skills and qualifications, and do not discriminate based on age, disability, religion, gender, sexual orientation, socioeconomic status, or nationality.

title: Consultor Jde - Cnc
description:

title: It Integration Platform Specialist
description:
The IT Integration Platform Specialist is a partner to the business community. This position is responsible for providing subject matter expertise in the areas of data integration and solution architecture, including providing solution alternatives, estimates, gathering and interpreting requirements, designing, documenting, and delivering solutions.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Technical lead for production issues and break fixes. Responsible for executing testing scenarios, migration planning, and Hyper Care for data integration production issues and break fixes;
  • Responsible forreviewing requirements, technical design, and creating/reviewing documentation (system diagrams) through the architectural review process. Review and validate end-to-end solution documentation for Tier I and Tier II support;
  • Continuously research emerging technologies, industry trends, and innovations to assess their relevance and potential impact on IT as it supports business operations;
  • Support the Data Integration Lead as SME expert on integration platform and governance.


Required Skills:

  • SQL
  • Data integration
  • Data analysis
  • SAP CPI, PI, PO

Other Specialized Skills & Abilities:

  • Advanced or Fluent English;
  • Very strong written and verbal communication skills;
  • Solid collaboration and relationship-building skills (e.G., leadership, communication, interpersonal, etc.) are critical;
  • Willingness to learn SAP, SAP PI, HANA Cloud Integration, and other integration tools.

title: Software Engineer Specialist
description:
This is an exciting opportunity to join Magalu Cloud as a Software Engineer focused on Software Defined Storage (SDS). We are building an organization that will be at the center of excellence for distributed technologies, and we are building it in Brasil! With Open Source at the heart of our solutions, we are tackling some of the greatest challenges in cloud computing and we’d like you to be part of it.

This is a key role in our SDS team, responsible for storage solutions offered by our platforms to our end users. A perfect candidate will never be content with today’s solution and would always look at how to improve the product and move the bar higher.


Responsibilities


  • Design and develop distributed SDS solutions
  • Lead and mentor junior engineers in the team
  • Collaborate with other teams to continuously improve product’s performance
  • Actively participate in upstream communities for the benefit of our organization and community itself
  • Provide bugfixes and improvements in the software, by working with other teams in the organization and wider Open Source community
  • Provide guidance and knowledge transfer to teams operating SDS product
  • Work with junior team members when building documentation for the product


Requirements


  • Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Computer/Electrical Engineering or related field, or proven equivalent professional experience. Experience must be in software development and/or distributed software maintenance
  • Experience as a software engineer
  • Experience working on Ceph based solutions
  • Understanding of various storage offerings;
    block, object, filesystem
  • Familiarity with OpenStack, Incus or LXD
  • Familiarity with Linux storage layer (VFS, block layer, device mapper)
  • Experience with Linux development, including debugging in the kernel and userspace
  • Experience in any two of these programing languages:
    C/C++, Python, Golang, Rust
  • Good written and verbal communication skills in Portuguese and English languages
  • Ability to work within the team, but also individually on dedicated tasks

How to stand out

  • Upstream patches in Ceph, Linux, OpenStack, Incus or LXD
  • Experience in building storage solutions for end users


Please remember to attach your CV in English for this position.

title: Analista De Sistemas
description:
Sobre nós

A Atos é uma líder global em transformação digital, com cerca de 94.000 colaboradores e uma receita anual de aproximadamente €11 bilhões de euros. Número um na Europa em cibersegurança, nuvem e computação de alto desempenho, o Grupo oferece soluções personalizadas de ponta a ponta para todos os setores em 69 países. Pioneira em serviços e produtos de descarbonização, a Atos está comprometida com um ambiente digital seguro e descarbonizado para seus clientes. A Atos é uma SE (Societas Europaea) e está listada na Euronext Paris.


*** Analista de Sistemas ***


Vaga home office =)


Horário comercial


Perfil Pleno


O que você vai fazer:

Descrição:

O profissional vai ser responsável pela gestão do backlog de demandas de projetos de desenvolvimento de aplicações, remover impedimentos, organizar sprints, validar entregas dos devs, ser representante do cliente com os times envolvidos, e fazer interface entre PO e equipe de desenvolvedores.


Principais atividades:


  • Levantar requisitos junto PO e passar para a equipe de desenvolvedores o que o cliente precisa.
  • Atuação e condução técnica de demandas de desenvolvimento e sustentação de aplicações.
  • Atuação como um representante da área de atuação junto aos clientes internos, equipes técnicas e outros fornecedores do cliente.
  • Acompanhamento, validação das entregas e outras atividades associadas ao serviço.
  • Experiência em programação
  • Participação em todas as cerimônias ágeis do time e do programa e acompanhamento das atividades realizadas pelo time de desenvolvimento;
  • Remoção de impedimentos do time de desenvolvimento nas situações não puderem ser tratadas pelo Agile Master ou ainda no caso de inexistência desse papel no time;
  • Definição e/ou validação da arquitetura técnica dos novos desenvolvimentos,
  • Avaliação da qualidade das aplicações, identificação de GAPs e débitos técnicos, e elaboração de planos de adequação;
  • Elaboração de apresentações, treinamentos e participação em reuniões técnicas que se façam necessárias no ciclo de vida dos produtos mantidos pela equipe;
  • Ter experiênciacom programação (não vai trabalhar 'codando', mas é necessário ter conhecimento)




O que buscamos? - Requisitos


  • Graduação completa em qualquer faculdade de TI.
  • Experiência como Analista de Sistemas, com desenvolvimento de software, ou testes de software, ou cargos correlatos a linha de serviço com sistemas.
  • Experiência com linguagem .NET ou JAVA;
    API Rest
  • AWS
  • Github;
    Gitlab



Benefícios:

✓ Plano de saúde extensível a cônjuge e filhos

✓ Plano odontológico

✓ Programa de remuneração variável

✓ Auxílio creche - conforme regras sindicais da localidade

✓ Wellhub (Gympass)

✓ Convênio com farmácias – descontos em medicamentos

✓ Previdência Privada com seguro de vida adicional

✓ Seguro de vida

✓ Empréstimo Consignado (após 1 ano de empresa)

✓ Convênio com empresas parceiras (Descontos para realização de graduação, pós-graduação, MBA e Idiomas)

✓ Política de Subsídios para Pós-graduação, MBAs e Certificações (A Atos apoia o seu desenvolvimento, subsidiando financeiramente ações externas)

✓ Speexx (curso online de até 5 idiomas gratuitamente)

✓ Programa de treinamentos internos e externos

✓ Universidade corporativa (E-learning com milhares de cursos disponíveis gratuitamente)

✓ Terapia online

✓ Programa de acompanhamento à gestante (acompanhamento médico online durante a gestação para colaboradoras ou cônjuges)

✓ Programa Minha Nova Parceria de Confiança (para colaboradores e cônjuges. Válido também para filhos adotivos) - Brinde especial + Cartão presente com valor em dinheiro

✓ Day off no seu aniversário

✓ Parceria com a Samsung (descontos na compra de diversos produtos)

Aviso de Diversidade

Entendemos a diversidade como um fator valioso. Todas as nossas oportunidades são Afirmativas para Pessoas com Deficiência.

title: Site Reliability Engineer
description:
Código da oportunidade:
47954


Há 31 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. Com uma plataforma de serviços end to end, oferecemos as mais eficientes e inovadoras soluções, tecnologias e metodologias, promovendo uma jornada de transformação para grandes marcas, de diferentes segmentos, no Brasil e no exterior.

Temos 2.500 funcionários e a empresa é destaque como um dos melhores lugares para trabalhar pelo GPTW e Glassdoor.


BRQ WAY

No nosso BRQ WAY temos a missão de conectar, transformar e empoderar cada um dos nossos profissionais, que por aqui são chamados de feras, para que todos tenham a chance de usar sua paixão para transformar o mundo com tecnologia!

É isso que queremos, com nosso Programa de Diversidade e Inclusão trabalhamos com dois objetivos:
equidade e inclusão, buscamos aumentar a participação dos grupos minoritários, quebrar os vieses inconscientes e expandir a conscientização sobre temas tão importantes para que todos sejam livres para serem quem são.

Vamos transformar juntos! Vem ser fera com a gente.


  • Ei, venha fazer parte de uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país!


- O que procuramos?

Buscamos um #fera com espírito empreendedor e que sabe que é o verdadeiro protagonista do seu sucesso! Queremos em nosso time pessoas motivadas por desafios, constante evolução e, claro, que são apaixonadas por tecnologia e transformação!

Profissional SRE com conhecimento em desenvolvimento, GCP e Data Analytics

Conhecimento em Bitbucket (incluindo pipelines).

Experiência com ferramentas de CI/CD, como Jenkins, GitHub Actions e ArgoCD.

Conhecimento em práticas DevOps e infraestrutura como código (Terraform, Docker).

Necessario conhecer GCP, Pythone Bash.

Experiência inicial com ferramentas como BigQuery ou Looker

Capacidade de gerar dashboards simples e consultas SQL


VAGA 100% Home Office


- O que temos pra te oferecer?

Mais do que um plano de carreira!

A BRQ acredita que cada fera deve ser protagonista do seu crescimento, tendo autonomia para criar seu próprio plano de desenvolvimento profissional. Nosso plano de carreira é dividido em 4 pilares:

Carreira técnica:
Você pode seguir a trilha de crescimento técnico, se o seu objetivo for se desenvolver cada vez mais em diferentes tecnologias. Oferecemos diversos treinamentos!

Carreira de Liderança:
Você pode seguir a trilha e se tornar um líder, desenvolver pessoas, auxiliar na evolução profissional e pessoal e estimular o crescimento para o surgimento de novos talentos.

Experiência internacional:
Estamos crescendo cada vez mais fora do Brasil e você tem possibilidade de atuar em projetos para outros países, ou diretamente nos países onde a BRQ tem sede.

Empreendedorismo:
De funcionário para sócio! Temos o Innovation Hub, a Corporate Venture que investe em ideias de profissionais que tenham sinergia com nosso negócio.


- E os benefícios?

Plano de Saúde;
Plano Odontológico;
Seguro de Vida;
Vale Refeição;
Vale Alimentação;
Horário Flexível;
Home Office;
Gympass, Telemedicina, Telenutrição, Canal de suporte emocional 24h e muito mais!


- Como é trabalhar na BRQ?

Temos um clima descontraído, diversos programas e eventos internos. Adoramos comemorar! E fazemos isso muito bem! Veja aqui no Youtube:
youtube.Com/brqdigitalsolutions


Curtiu? Então inscreva-se e venha para o melhor da Transformação Digital com a gente!

title: Senior Postgresql Database Administrator
description:
Project Description:

Our Client is one of the largest CPG companies is modernizing their IT landscape towards Cloud infrastructure. As part of this program multiple applications are impacted with strategic changes across portfolio. We are looking for strong DBA to support program with the Postgre SQL experience to join our team of professional engineers across the globe.


Responsibilities:

- Google knowledge on Azure, AWS, and Google Cloud technologies.

- Familier on PostgreSQL provision, configuration and management.

- Creating database objects (triggers, indexes, etc.)

- Monitoring and ensuring database performance in cloud environments.

- Identifying potential issues with the database and resolving them in a timely manner to ensure optimal performance and reliability.

- Ensuring the maintenance of backups and conducting disaster recovery operations in accordance with business requirements and standards.

- Monitoring security and preventing unauthorized access and follow compliance procedures.

- Scheduling server maintenance in accordance with business requirements, after coordinating with all relevant stakeholders to ensure minimal disruption and optimal timing.

- Providing best practice guidance to the development/application/stake holders.

- Resolving production data issues as per given SLA timeline to avoid major incidents.

- Managing tablespaces and roles as per given security standards.

- Developing automation technologies for data loading and data refresh activities.

- Database Migrations between cross platforms (Oracle, MS SQL and DB2) into Multi Cloud (Azure, AWS and GCP) PostgreSQL database technology.

- Ensuring data integrity and managing user access and permissions as per the organization standards.

- Using utilities like PgAdmin4, Azure Data studio and psql for database maintenance.



Mandatory Skills Description:

- A minimum of 5 years of experience is required in PostgreSQL database technology, specifically with multi-cloud environments including Azure, AWS, and GCP tenants.

- Proven previous experience as a PostgreSQL DBA or similar role.

- In-depth understanding of database management and security.

- Strong problem-solving and communication skills.


- Responsible for managing a firm's PostgreSQL databases in multi-cloud environments (Azure, AWS, and GCP), ensuring smooth operation and functionality to meet business goals. Experience in optimizing database performance, managing database issues and backups for point-in-time recovery, disaster recovery, and monitoring security and access management as per business requirements.

- Experience in Multi Cloud tenant(Azure, AWS, and GCP) to provision the PostgreSQL PaaS solution and configure as per security standards.

- Experienced in database migrations across platforms from legacy databases (SQL, Oracle, and DB2) to multi-cloud PostgreSQL PaaS databases.

- Understanding access management to ensure database security. This includes controlling who can access the database and to what extent, as well as removing inactive users when necessary.

- Problem-solving is another crucial soft skill. Given that troubleshooting is a key responsibility, the candidate must be adept at identifying and addressing potential issues swiftly. They should be capable of devising quick and effective solutions to resolve these problems efficiently.

- Effective communication skills are crucial for collaborating with the application team and stakeholders to comprehend business requirements and deliver DBA support during AMS working hours. This involves actively engaging with team members and stakeholders to ensure clear understanding and alignment on project goals. Additionally, providing timely and efficient DBA support during AMS working hours is essential for maintaining smooth operations and addressing any issues that may arise.

- PostgreSQL DBA (Database Administrator) is responsible for managing and optimizing the PostgreSQL database system on multi-cloud (Azure, AWS, and GCP) tenant and provide support on AMS working hours.


Nice-to-Have Skills Description:

Bachelor's degree in computer science, Information Technology, or a related field.

- Multi Cloud (Azure/AWS/GCP) Certified Professional.


Languages:

English:
B2 Upper Intermediate

title: Supply Chain Planner - Advanced English - Remote
description:
HCLTech is a global technology company, home to 227,000+ people across 60 countries, delivering industry-leading capabilities centered around digital, engineering and cloud, powered by a broad portfolio of technology services and products. We work with clients across all major verticals, providing industry solutions for Financial Services, Manufacturing, Life Sciences and Healthcare, Technology and Services, Telecom and Media, Retail and CPG, and Public Services. Consolidated revenues as of 12 months ending September 2022 totaled $12.1 billion.

To learn how we can supercharge progress for you, visit />//


As a Product planner, Demand & Supply Planning Program Manager , you will be responsible for the data center equipment supply planning for sustaining and new products, interpretation of the data center demand signal and translating it to a supply & inventory plan for equipment and drive optimal planning decisions. You will work closely with Data Center Supply Planning, Purchasing, Engineering, Fulfillment, Commodity Management, and Contract Manufacturing teams to develop and oversee the execution of an accurate supply and inventory plan through the product life cycle.


You will apply your knowledge of supply chain principles and your problem solving prowess to key planning processes. You will establish and drive metrics, drive process and system improvements to accomplish efficiency and scalability goals and influence our rapidly growing data center infrastructure supply chain.


Responsibilities:

Manage material demand & supply, including inventory, to meet existing and new product demand requirements to meet business objectives, coordinating with Demand Planning on changes to demand which impacts delivery of key components as demand needs fluctuate

Proactive communication of sustaining and new product material plans and status to internal customers.

Identify and quickly solve supply chain gaps and inefficiencies. Clearly document process solutions and requirements. Define and manage clear business metrics and goals to manage supply chain performance

Leverage Market intelligence and Statistical inputs towards driving continued, sustained improvements of inventory models and supply chain buffers.

Develop short and long term supply models to minimize total costs and inventories while maintaining service levels, develop and justify inventory buffer strategies that optimize cost and flexibility.


Minimum Qualifications (MQs)

  • BA/BS degree in Supply Chain, Industrial Engineering or equivalent practical experience in relevant industry
  • Project Management experience with the ability to communicate/collaborate cross-functionally with technical/non-technical groups spanning all organizational levels
  • Experience using Material Requirements Planning Tools
  • Spreadsheet/database capabilities, able to create models and maneuver within them to manage supply chain processes
  • Advanced English


Preferred Qualifications (PQs)

  • MS/MBA degree in Business Process Management, Industrial Engineering, Supply Chain Management or related planning disciplines.
  • Expertise in Analytics / SQL / BigQuery
  • A Supply Chain Certification
  • Knowledge of financial and cost accounting practices
  • Deep knowledge of S&OP processes as well as experience in development and implementation of planning systems and processes
  • Understanding and experience in using Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) and Product Lifecycle Management (PLM) systems and tools
  • Experience in planning materials for new product launches and transitions

title: Python Backend Software Engineer (Brazil)
description:
Python Backend Software Engineer

BeyondRisk AI-6

Brazil (Remote)


Python Backend Software Engineer

Join BeyondRisk AI-6 and build the intelligent engine powering the next generation of enterprise automation! We're seeking passionate Backend Software Engineers to architect and construct the core infrastructure that enables our AI-6 platform to automate complex business processes and drive transformative outcomes for global organizations. Your work will be the bedrock upon which our cutting-edge AI solutions operate.


About the Role

We’re looking for skilled Backend Software Engineers excited by the challenge of building highly scalable, resilient, and secure server-side systems designed for AI-driven workflows . You'll tackle complex problems in distributed systems design, optimize data pipelines for real-time AI interactions, and build the robust infrastructure handling potentially millions of automated tasks daily. You'll primarily use Python on AWS, design critical APIs, manage data persistence (PostgreSQL, Redis), and ensure seamless integration with messaging systems like Kafka. You'll collaborate closely with frontend, product, and our AI/ML teams , gaining exposure to how backend systems power intelligent applications and exploring ways AI can enhance development velocity and system performance.


This role is fully remote, based in Brazil. We embrace a flexible remote work environment.


Python Backend Software Engineer

Location:
 Remote, Brazil


About BeyondRisk AI-6


BeyondRisk empowers organizations to rapidly design, build, and scale AI-driven solutions through our AI-6 platform. We seamlessly bring together smart agents, data, and automation so enterprises can solve their toughest challenges at speed. Backed by leading Silicon Valley investors - we’re expanding our core engineering team. If you’re passionate about building robust backend systems that power cutting-edge AI, join us.


Key Responsibilities

  • Design, build, test, deploy, and maintain scalable backend services, APIs, and applications primarily using Python.
  • Create well-documented, reliable, and performant RESTful APIs using standards like OpenAPI/Swagger.
  • Design and implement backend systems capable of efficiently serving, monitoring, and interacting with machine learning models and AI workflows.
  • Design data models and manage interactions with databases like PostgreSQL and caching systems like Redis.
  • Explore and leverage modern development practices, potentially including AI-assisted tooling, to accelerate the delivery of high-quality code and enhance system observability.
  • Work effectively with frontend engineers, AI/ML specialists, product managers, and other stakeholders to deliver cohesive solutions.
  • Champion high-quality code, perform code reviews, and advocate for engineering best practices.


You’ll Excel in This Role If You:

  • Have Proven Backend Engineering Experience:
     Several years of hands-on experience building, deploying, and operating backend systems in production environments.
  • Are Proficient in Python:
     Strong programming skills in Python 3.X for backend development.
  • Embrace Cloud Technologies:
     Enjoy working with and have experience building solutions on cloud platforms, particularly AWS.
  • Are Passionate About APIs:
     Have a strong understanding of RESTful API design principles and best practices.
  • Are Curious about AI/ML concepts and interested in building the infrastructure that powers intelligent systems.
  • Are a Collaborative Problem Solver:
     Thrive in a team environment, enjoy tackling complex technical challenges, and communicate effectively.
  • Focus on Quality & Scalability:
     Understand the importance of writing clean, testable, maintainable code and building systems that scale.
  • Adapt Quickly:
     Are comfortable working in a fast-paced environment and learning new technologies.


Preferred Qualifications

  • Demonstrable track record of building and deploying complex backend systems in production.
  • Strong proficiency with Python 3.X for backend development (experience with both is a plus).
  • Experience building and consuming RESTful APIs, with knowledge of OpenAPI/Swagger.
  • Hands-on experience with relational databases (PostgreSQL preferred) and caching (Redis preferred).
  • Experience with microservices architecture is a plus.
  • Familiarity with infrastructure-as-code (Terraform, CloudFormation) is beneficial.


Why Join BeyondRisk

  • Compensation & Equity:
     Competitive salary + stock options.
  • High-Impact Role:
     Directly contribute to the core platform powering BeyondRisk’s success globally.
  • Cutting-Edge AI Platform:
     Work on the backend systems of a next-gen hyper-automation solution transforming enterprises.
  • Culture & Learning:
     A culture of continuous learning, technical excellence, and close collaboration between engineering and AI/ML teams.
  • Global Collaboration:
     Thrive in a dynamic, international environment, working closely with talented colleagues across the US, Europe, and Asia.
  • Fast-Paced Growth:
     Collaborate with a passionate team and a hands-on leadership group, backed by top Silicon Valley investors.
  • Long-Term Opportunity:
     Shape the future of AI – be at the forefront of enterprise innovation by building the technology that enables it.


Ready to Build the Future of AI?

If you’re excited to build scalable, robust backend systems that power cutting-edge AI solutions, we want to hear from you.


Apply now with an up-to-date CV (PDF). Come shape the next era of enterprise AI at BeyondRisk.

description:

Há 31 anos no mercado, a BRQ Digital Solutions se consolidou como uma das maiores empresas de transformação digital do país. Com uma plataforma de serviços end to end, oferecemos as mais eficientes e inovadoras soluções, tecnologias e metodologias, promovendo uma jornada de transformação para grandes marcas, de diferentes segmentos, no Brasil e no exterior.


Nossos 2.500 mil funcionários atuam no modelo de trabalho Anywhere Office e a empresa é destaque como um dos melhores lugares para trabalhar pelo GPTW e Glassdoor.

No nosso BRQ WAY temos a missão de conectar, transformar e empoderar cada um dos nossos profissionais, que por aqui são chamados de feras, para que todos tenham a chance de usar sua paixão para transformar o mundo com tecnologia!

equidade e inclusão, buscamos aumentar a participação dos grupos minoritários, quebrar os vieses inconscientes e expandir a conscientização sobre temas tão importantes para que todos sejam livres para serem quem são.

  • Desenvolvimento de aplicações utilizando a linguagem C# e React.Js.
  • Experiência com Cloud AWS.

    S3, RDS (PostgreSQL), DynamoDB, Lambda Functions, API Gateway, CloudFront, CloudWatch, OpenSearch.
  • Controle de versão utilizando Git para versionamento de código.
  • Azure DevOps:
    Utilização de ferramentas para gerenciamento de código-fonte, integração contínua e entrega contínua (CI/CD).


Modelo de atuação:
Híbrido 3x presenciais por semana em Botafogo - Rio de Janeiro

Mais do que um plano de carreira !


A BRQ acredita que cada fera deve ser protagonista do seu crescimento, tendo autonomia para criar seu próprio plano de desenvolvimento profissional. Nosso plano de carreira é dividido em 4 pilares:


Carreira técnica:
 Você pode seguir a trilha de crescimento técnico, se o seu objetivo for se desenvolver cada vez mais em diferentes tecnologias. Oferecemos diversos treinamentos!


Carreira de Liderança:
Você pode seguir a trilha e se tornar um líder, desenvolver pessoas, auxiliar na evolução profissional e pessoal e estimular o crescimento para o surgimento de novos talentos.


Experiência internacional:
 Estamos crescendo cada vez mais fora do Brasil e você tem possibilidade de atuar em projetos para outros países, ou diretamente nos países onde a BRQ tem sede.


Empreendedorismo:
 De funcionário para sócio! Temos o Innovation Hub, a Corporate Venture que investe em ideias de profissionais que tenham sinergia com nosso negócio.


- E os benefícios?


Plano de Saúde;
Plano Odontológico;
Seguro de Vida;
Vale Refeição;
Vale Alimentação;
Horário Flexível;
Gympass, Telemedicina, Telenutrição, Canal de suporte emocional 24h e muito mais!


- Como é trabalhar na BRQ?


Temos um clima descontraído, diversos programas e eventos internos. Adoramos comemorar! E fazemos isso muito bem! Veja aqui no Youtube:
youtube.Com/brqdigitalsolutions

title: Executivo De Expansão
description:
O que buscamos?

Estamos em busca de um profissional estratégico, proativo e orientado a resultados. Esse profissional terá o desafio de estruturar e fortalecer o processo de prospecção ativa, atrair novos empreendedores e desenvolver novas oportunidades de negócios.


Principais Responsabilidades

- Atuar de forma consultiva para oferecer soluções atrativas.

- Desenvolver e executar um pipeline estruturado de leads, utilizando ferramentas de CRM e automação de vendas.

- Criar estratégias para atrair novos clientes de alto nível, garantindo a qualificação de mix e a diversidade gastronômica.

- Atuar na identificação de novas oportunidades de negócio, seja pela introdução de novos formatos de pontos comerciais, parcerias estratégicas ou expansão do portfólio.

- Trabalhar de forma data-driven, analisando tendências de mercado, concorrência, fluxos de público e comportamento dos consumidores para embasar as estratégias de expansão.

- Colaborar com as áreas de Marketing, Mídia e Experiências, garantindo sinergia entre a comercialização dos pontos disponíveis e outras frentes de monetização da empresa.


Requisitos e Qualificações

- Experiência sólida em área comercial, venda de espaços ou gestão de negócios em segmentos como shoppings, aeroportos, mídia OOH ou franquias gastronômicas.

- Habilidade em negociação estratégica de alto padrão e construção de parcerias de longo prazo.

- Conhecimento em técnicas de prospecção ativa, funil de vendas e ABM (Account-Based Marketing).

- Mentalidade consultiva e orientada a resultados, com forte capacidade analítica, de comunicação, relacionamento interpessoal e foco em soluções.

- Vivência com CRM e ferramentas de automação de vendas (ex:
RD Station, HubSpot, Salesforce). - Capacidade de identificar novas oportunidades de monetização dentro do ecossistema da empresa.

- Inglês fluente;

- Pacote Office;

- Formação superior em Administração, Marketing ou áreas correlacionadas.


Diferenciais

- Experiência no setor de mídia OOH, Shopping ou Pontos Turísticos.

- Conexões com redes de franquias gastronômicas e investidores do setor de food service.

- Conhecimento do mercado de entretenimento, eventos e brand experience.

title: Account Manager
description:
Hey, Dingus!


Yeah, you heard that right.

Dingus & Zazzy is looking for a motivated, ambitious Account Manager to join our growing team!


Dingus & Zazzy is a comprehensive digital marketing agency offering services for brands looking to expand their presence across a variety of digital platforms. Running a company is a little like building a plane while flying it. There’s always too much to do;
doing one thing means neglecting something else. You have to blog but also be active on social media. You have to build websites and then optimize them for mobile. Email lists. Emails. Keywords. SEM. SEO. UX. UI. FML. OMG. That’s where we come in. We provide an unlimited get-shit-done subscription for our clients. And we need your help!


About You

  • You know how to build trust with clients through clear communication, consistent follow-up, and by always showing up prepared.
  • You’re skilled at translating client goals into specific, actionable tasks, and you make sure those tasks are assigned, tracked, and delivered on time.
  • You lead client meetings with confidence, take organized notes (yes, every time), and share updates that actually move things forward.
  • You manage feedback like a pro—you stay calm, navigate tough conversations with professionalism, and keep relationships strong.
  • You’re detail-oriented and deadline-driven. You keep an eye on deliverables, catch misalignment early, and ensure work is polished before it ever reaches the client.
  • You thrive in fast-moving environments and know how to prioritize without dropping the ball—even when things get messy.


Purpose of This Position

The primary objective of this role is to build and maintain strong, positive client relationships through clear communication and reliable service. The Account Manager is the main point of contact for clients, responsible for managing meetings, setting expectations, sharing updates, and presenting final work. This role ensures that clients feel informed, supported, and confident in the progress and outcomes of their projects.


Main Objectives


  1. Client Collaboration and Project Oversight :
  • Work with clients to understand their marketing goals. Translate those goals into clear, actionable tasks and hand them off to the Marketing Coordinator to assign tasks and keep things moving internally.

- Utilize Jiminny to create and share meeting notes after every single meeting

- Share any critical snippets from the meeting as they relate to projects

- Handover the meeting notes, action items, and recording packaged nicely in the meeting template

  • Review final deliverables before submission to ensure they align with client expectations and goals.

- Frequent meetings with clients to share deliverables and review progress together.

  • Serve as the main point of contact for clients, providing regular updates, addressing concerns, and delivering exceptional customer service throughout the project lifecycle.


2. Relationship Building and Industry Engagement:

  • Build and maintain strong relationships with clients and industry contacts, using these connections to strengthen collaboration, improve outcomes, and contribute to long-term success.



Additional Skills


  • Strategic Thinking :
    Able to understand client goals and work with the Account Strategy Director and Senior Account Manager to shape big-picture plans that guide execution.
  • Verbal & Written Communication :
    Strong communicator who can clearly explain timelines, manage expectations, and present deliverables in a way that builds trust.
  • Emotional Intelligence :
    Skilled at reading situations, navigating client personalities, and staying calm and professional, even under pressure.
  • Time Management :
    Able to balance meetings, client communication, and planning without losing sight of deliverable deadlines.
  • Presentation Skills :
    Comfortable leading client meetings, walking through results, and representing the agency in a polished, confident way.


Reporting Relationship


  • This role reports to the Senior Account Manager


Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)


  • Client Satisfaction Score (CSAT) :
    9/10 or higher average score from client check-ins or post-project feedback.
  • Client Retention Rate :
    93%+ of clients renew or continue service.

title: Test Automation Engineer (Geb + Spock)
description:
Job Title:
 Test Automation Contractor (Geb + Spock)

Location:
 Remote (LATAM)

Duration:
 3+ Months (Starting June 30th)


Project Overview:

We are launching a new customer-facing project focused on UI test automation using the GEB framework with Spock . The engagement will run for an initial 3-month period starting June 30th . We have already secured one resource and are looking to add one more contractor to the team to support test development and execution.


Job Description:

We are seeking a Test Automation Contractor with hands-on experience in Geb and Spock to build and maintain UI test cases for a web-based application. This role will involve working closely with our QA lead, customer stakeholders, and developers to interpret requirements and translate them into automated tests.


Key Responsibilities:

  • Design, develop, and maintain automated UI test scripts using Geb and Spock
  • Use Selenium WebDriver for browser automation
  • Ensure test coverage across multiple browsers and platforms
  • Work within an Agile/Scrum team to support regular sprint cycles
  • Collaborate closely with technical leads, developers, and QA team members

  • Report issues clearly and track defect resolutions


Required Skills & Experience:

  • 2+ years of experience with Geb and Spock framework
  • Strong knowledge of Groovy scripting
  • Experience with Selenium WebDriver
  • Solid understanding of HTML, CSS selectors, and JavaScript
  • Familiarity with cross-browser testing strategies
  • Experience working in Agile environments
  • Strong verbal and written communication skills
  • Detail-oriented and proactive in identifying issues and quality gaps


Preferred:

title: React Frontend Developer (Brazil)
description:
React Frontend Software Engineer

BeyondRisk AI-6

Brazil (Remote)


React Frontend Software Engineer

Join BeyondRisk AI-6 and craft the user experience that brings the power of enterprise AI to life! We're seeking a creative and skilled Frontend Software Engineer to design and build intuitive, high-performance user interfaces for our AI-6 platform. Your work will directly shape how users interact with complex AI capabilities, making sophisticated automation accessible and easy to use for global organizations.


About the Role

We’re looking for a React Frontend Software Engineer passionate about building exceptional web applications with modern technologies. You'll be responsible for designing, developing, testing, and iterating on the user-facing components of the BeyondRisk AI-6 platform. Working primarily with React, TypeScript, JavaScript (ES6+), MUI, and Styled Components , you'll translate complex requirements and AI workflows into intuitive, visually appealing, and highly functional user interfaces. You’ll manage application state effectively using Redux or Context API , integrate seamlessly with backend RESTful APIs , and prioritize performance optimization (e.G., lazy loading) and web accessibility . You'll collaborate closely with UI/UX designers, backend engineers, product managers, and AI teams to deliver a seamless and engaging user experience.


This role is fully remote, based in Brazil. We embrace a flexible remote work environment.


React Frontend Software Engineer

Location:
 Remote, Brazil


About BeyondRisk AI-6

BeyondRisk empowers organizations to rapidly design, build, and scale AI-driven solutions through our AI-6 platform. We seamlessly bring together smart agents, data, and automation so enterprises can solve their toughest challenges at speed. Backed by leading Silicon Valley investors - we’re expanding our core engineering team. If you’re passionate about building intuitive interfaces for cutting-edge AI, join us.


Key Responsibilities

  • Develop & Maintain UIs:
     Build, test, and maintain responsive, high-quality user interfaces using React, TypeScript, and modern JavaScript (ES6+).
  • Component Implementation:
     Utilize component libraries like MUI and implement custom components with Styled Components, ensuring visual consistency and reusability.
  • State Management:
     Manage complex application state effectively using Redux (with middleware like Thunk) or React's Context API.
  • API Integration:
     Consume backend RESTful APIs efficiently and manage data flow within the frontend application.
  • Performance Optimization:
     Implement techniques like lazy loading, code splitting, and efficient rendering strategies to ensure optimal application performance.
  • Accessibility:
     Build interfaces adhering to web accessibility standards (WCAG) to ensure usability for all users.
  • Cross-functional Collaboration:
     Work closely with UI/UX designers to implement pixel-perfect designs and collaborate with backend engineers and product managers to deliver features.
  • Code Quality & Testing:
     Write clean, maintainable, well-documented, and tested code (experience with Jest/React Testing Library is a plus).
  • Browser Compatibility:
     Ensure consistent performance and appearance across major web browsers.


You’ll Excel in This Role If You:

  • Have Proven Frontend Experience:
     Several years building complex, interactive web applications in production environments, particularly with React.
  • Are Proficient in React & TypeScript:
     Possess a deep understanding of React (including Hooks, Context API) and strong proficiency in TypeScript.
  • Have a Passion for UI/UX:
     Care deeply about creating intuitive, user-friendly, and visually appealing interfaces.
  • Master Modern Frontend Tooling:
     Are comfortable with JavaScript (ES6+), CSS-in-JS (Styled Components), package managers (npm/yarn), and build tools.
  • Have Strong API Integration Skills:
     Are experienced in consuming RESTful APIs and managing asynchronous operations.
  • Are a Collaborative Team Player:
     Communicate effectively and enjoy working closely with designers, backend developers, and product teams.
  • Focus on Quality & Performance:
     Advocate for best practices in code quality, testing, performance optimization, and accessibility.
  • Are Eager to Learn:
     Stay updated with the rapidly evolving frontend ecosystem.


Preferred Qualifications

  • Demonstrable track record of building complex, interactive user interfaces for web applications.
  • Strong proficiency in JavaScript (ES6+) , TypeScript , and React (Hooks, Context API) .
  • Experience with component libraries (MUI preferred ) and CSS-in-JS (Styled Components preferred ).
  • Solid understanding and practical experience with state management libraries/patterns (Redux/Thunk or Context API ).
  • Proven experience integrating with RESTful APIs .
  • Good understanding of frontend performance optimization techniques (lazy loading, code splitting, memoization) .
  • Familiarity with web accessibility standards (WCAG) .
  • Experience with frontend testing frameworks (e.G., Jest, React Testing Library) is a significant plus.
  • Familiarity with modern frontend build tools (e.G., Webpack, Vite) is beneficial.
  • Proficiency with version control using Git.


Why Join BeyondRisk

  • Compensation & Equity:
     Competitive salary + stock options.
  • High-Impact Role:
     Directly shape the user experience of a cutting-edge AI platform used by global enterprises.
  • Cutting-Edge AI Platform:
     Work on the frontend interfaces for a next-gen hyper-automation solution transforming enterprises.
  • Culture & Learning:
     A culture of continuous learning, technical excellence, and close collaboration between engineering and AI/ML teams.
  • Global Collaboration:
     Thrive in a dynamic, international environment, working closely with talented colleagues across the US, Europe, and Asia.
  • Fast-Paced Growth:
     Collaborate with a passionate team and a hands-on leadership group, backed by top Silicon Valley investors.
  • Long-Term Opportunity:
     Shape the future of AI – be at the forefront of enterprise innovation by building the technology that enables it.


Ready to Build the Future of AI Interfaces?

If you’re excited to build intuitive, high-performance user interfaces that bring sophisticated AI capabilities to users, we want to hear from you.


Apply now with an up-to-date CV (PDF). Come shape the next era of enterprise AI at BeyondRisk.

title: Legal Counsel (Commercial Contracting)
description:
About YipitData:

YipitData is the market-leading data and analytics firm. We analyze billions of data points every day to provide accurate, detailed insights across industries, including consumer brands, technology, software, and healthcare.

Our insights team uses proprietary technology to identify, license, clean, and analyze the data that many of the world’s largest investment funds and corporations depend on. We raised $475M from The Carlyle Group at a valuation over $1B, further accelerating our growth and market impact.

We have been recognized multiple times as one of Inc’s Best Workplaces. As a fast-growing company backed by The Carlyle Group and Norwest Venture Partners, YipitData is driven by a people-first culture rooted in mastery, ownership, and transparency.

With offices in New York, Austin, Miami, Denver, Mountain View, Seattle, Hong Kong, Shanghai, Beijing, Guangzhou, and Singapore, we continue to expand our reach and impact across global markets.


About The Role:

At YipitData, our legal team is an essential and collaborative partner in the Company’s growth. As Counsel, Commercial Contracts , you will work with our commercial teams to review, draft, and manage a wide variety of commercial contracts:
non-disclosure agreements, vendor and partnership agreements, services agreements and statements of work, and customer agreements.


We expect Eastern Time work hours for this position.


As Our Counsel, Commercial Contracts You Will:

  • Develop contract negotiation and drafting skills to manage a wide variety of commercial matters for YipitData, including contracts with vendors, partners, and customers.
  • Learn in a rapidly changing environment by navigating new problems and conceiving novel contracting frameworks when needed.
  • Respond promptly to legal requests from Sales, Finance, Product, Marketing, Human Resources, and other internal clients to facilitate contract review, support their business needs and communicate legal issues in clear and concise terms.
  • Enhance processes, efficiency, and best practices, including ongoing improvements to contract templates and contract management processes.
  • Evaluate and advise on appropriate legal courses of action to meet Company and business unit needs.


You Are Likely To Succeed If:

  • 3-5 years of experience as a practicing attorney at a law firm or in-house.
  • You are excited by and highly determined to work on commercial contracts. You have a passion for drafting, negotiating, and redlining and are eager to further develop these skills.
  • Your attention to detail is stellar.
  • You have excellent interpersonal and communication skills and enjoy working cross-functionally.
  • You thrive in the unknown, are motivated to think creatively each day and can handle new areas of responsibility independently.
  • Experience drafting and negotiating US business contracts is strongly preferred.
  • Nice to have:
     You have a law degree (JD or LLM) from a top law school in the United States, are licensed to practice and a member of good standing of a United States bar, and have the appropriate practical knowledge, skills and abilities acquired through 3-5 years of relevant experience.


This is an exciting opportunity for a top law firm associate or experienced attorney at a high-growth tech or data product company with strong communication skills and impeccable judgment.


What We Offer:

  • Flexible PTO for any reason, including sick days (no specified limits)
  • Flexible work schedule
  • Personal laptop
  • Health and wellness package
  • Remote work


Candidates must have primary residency (and be physically located) in the country of hire (AKA Colombia/Brazil) in order to be considered for the position. If hired, the worker must maintain primary residency in the country of hire in order to be eligible for employment.


We are committed to equal employment opportunity regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, marital status, disability, gender, gender identity or expression, or veteran status. We are proud to be an equal-opportunity employer.

title: Arquiteto De Software Pleno
description:
Principais Atividades

  • Definir e implementar arquiteturas de software baseadas em padrões consolidados como Microservices , Domain-Driven Design (DDD) , SOA , MVC e diversos Design Patterns .
  • Desenvolver e otimizar aplicações em Java , com uso avançado dos frameworks Spring , Spring Boot e Hibernate .
  • Projetar e construir APIs RESTful , gRPC e SOAP , assegurando integração eficiente, segura e de alta performance entre sistemas distribuídos.
  • Realizar monitoramento de desempenho e tuning de aplicações Java , com foco em profiling e otimização de JVM .
  • Projetar e otimizar bancos de dados relacionais (Microsoft SQL Server, MySQL, PostgreSQL) e NoSQL (MongoDB), com atenção à modelagem, performance e escalabilidade.
  • Aplicar práticas avançadas de segurança em aplicações Java , incluindo Secure Coding , uso de Spring Security e mitigação de vulnerabilidades conforme OWASP Top Ten .
  • Construir pipelines de CI/CD utilizando ferramentas como Azure DevOps e Jenkins , promovendo entregas contínuas e automatizadas.
  • Implementar contêineres e soluções de orquestração com Docker e Kubernetes , com foco em escalabilidade, resiliência e segurança.
  • Empregar Infraestrutura como Código (IaC) com ferramentas como Terraform e Ansible , gerenciando ambientes em Azure , Google Cloud Platform (GCP) e AWS .
  • Utilizar ferramentas de monitoramento e observabilidade , como Prometheus , Grafana e ELK Stack , para garantir alta disponibilidade e desempenho dos sistemas.
  • Desenvolver interfaces front-end com Angular e React , aplicando boas práticas de usabilidade, responsividade e performance.
  • Integrar práticas de DevSecOps aos pipelines, utilizando ferramentas de SAST , SCA e DAST , como SonarQube , OWASP ZAP e GitLab Advanced Security .
  • Atuar com metodologias ágeis (Scrum/Kanban), liderando sprints, facilitando cerimônias ágeis e promovendo entregas incrementais de valor.


Requisitos Técnicos Obrigatórios

  • Certificação Microsoft Certified:
    Azure Solutions Architect Expert     ou Certified Professional in Software Architecture (CPSA) , com comprovação necessária.


Conhecimentos Técnicos Desejáveis

  • Arquitetura de Software :
    Microservices, DDD, SOA, Design Patterns, arquitetura orientada a eventos, sistemas distribuídos, mensageria com RabbitMQ.
  • Java :
    Proficiência avançada com versões recentes da linguagem, incluindo monitoramento e performance tuning.
  • Bancos de Dados :
    Modelagem, otimização, tuning e integração de soluções SQL e NoSQL.
  • CI/CD :
    Automação de pipelines com Azure DevOps e Jenkins.
  • APIs e Integração :
    REST, gRPC, SOAP, com documentação via Swagger/OpenAPI.
  • Contêineres :
    Docker, Kubernetes, práticas de segurança e observabilidade.
  • Cloud Computing :
    Azure, GCP e AWS, com domínio de IaC (Terraform, Ansible).
  • Segurança Aplicacional :
    Desenvolvimento seguro em Java, mitigação de vulnerabilidades, revisão de código com foco em segurança.
  • Testes Automatizados de Segurança :
    SAST, SCA e DAST (SonarQube, OWASP ZAP).
  • Front-end :
    Angular, React, JavaScript, TypeScript, HTML5, CSS3.
  • Testes Automatizados :
    Selenium, Robot, Cypress, integrados a pipelines.
  • Agilidade :
    Liderança em ambientes Scrum/Kanban, com condução de sprints, reviews e retrospectivas.


Certificações Desejáveis (Diferenciais)

  • Oracle Certified Professional, Java SE Programmer (OCPJP)
  • Certified Java Architect (CJA)
  • Microsoft Certified:
    Azure Solutions Architect Expert
  • AWS Certified Solutions Architect
  • Google Professional Cloud Architect


Modelo de contratação:
PJ

Tipo de Alocação:
 Remota

Horário de Trabal ho:
Seg à Sex - horário comercial
